name: Lost Control (LlamaDev Games)
description:
You have been tasked with killing all targets. You have been given a knife. You will earn money for each target killed. You may still earn money for killing an innocent person, but not much. Make sure you take care of your mental health. Make sure to keep control.

Made for the Game Maker's Took Kit Game Jam 2020

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC4UAbwMZQdi0UyGTORL6zPw - My Channel

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCcgZKU7wOzGtaj_GtFC0j8Q - OsirisMoon's Channel

Art and Music By OsirisMoon

Sound Effects by LlamaDev made in sfxr

Programming by LlamaDev
